sys_update_xml.name: sp_column_049823794f10330070cf4a10a310c716
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_column"><sp_column action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><class_name/><order>1</order><size>12</size><size_lg/><size_sm/><size_xs/><sp_row display_value="1">449823794f10330070cf4a10a310c714</sp_row><sys_class_name>sp_column</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-21 04:28:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>049823794f10330070cf4a10a310c716</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>1</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_column_049823794f10330070cf4a10a310c716</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-21 04:28:27</sys_updated_on></sp_column></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_6aa227314f10330070cf4a10a310c790
sys_update_xml.payload:
custom=2){orderArray.push(results.metaData.columns[1])} if(results.metaData.columns.length >=3){orderArray.push(results.metaData.columns[2])} return orderArray; } //////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //Document these Update Sets c.getUpdateSets = function(){ c.data.documentation = {}; c.data.showLoader = true; c.server.get({action: 'documentUpdateSets', definitions:definitions, exclusions:exclusions,updateSets: c.data.whichSets, includeAllColumns:c.data.includeAllColumns, collapseEmptyColumns:c.data.collapseEmptyColumns}).then(function(response){ c.data.columnHeader = response.data.columnHeader; c.data.documentation = response.data.documentation; c.data.excludedSummary = response.data.excludedSummary; c.data.activity = response.data.activity; c.data.whichSets = response.data.updateSets; c.data.visible = true; c.data.showLoader = false; console.log(c.data) }); }; //////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //Show options in a modal template c.openModal = function() { c.modalInstance = $uibModal.open({ templateUrl: 'modalTemplate', scope: $scope }); } //////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //Close the modal and get create the clone if asked c.closeModal = function(action) { c.modalInstance.close(); c.actioned = true; if(action=='cancel'){return;} c.server.get({updateSets: c.data.whichSets, action: 'mergeUpdateSets', newName: c.data.rComment}).then(function(response){}); } ////////////////////////////////////////////////// // Export to Word $scope.export2Word = function ( ) { var css = "" var header = ""+ "Update Set Documentation"+css+""; var creationDate = moment().local().format('dddd, MMMM Do YYYY, h:mm a'); //list the data sets var body ='

Update Set Documentation

'; body+='

An update set is a collection of configuration changes that can be moved from one instance to another. This allows administrators to group a series of changes into a named set and move them as a unit to other systems for testing or production deployment.

' body+='

This report was created on '+creationDate+' and spans the following update set(s):

' body+='
    ' for(var eachSet in c.data.whichSets){body+='
  • '+c.data.whichSets[eachSet].name+'
    • '} body+='
' //Rather than trying to export HTML and getting strange results with flexbox divs, we'll simply build a table from the angular scope data object for(var thisType in c.data.documentation){ body+= '

'+c.data.documentation[thisType].name+'

' body+= '

'+c.data.documentation[thisType].metaData.updateDescription+'

' body+= '' ////////////////////// //column headers var colOrder = []; for(var thisDetail in c.data.documentation[thisType].metaData.columnHeader){ body+= ''; colOrder.push(c.data.documentation[thisType].metaData.columns[thisDetail]); } body+= '' ////////////////////// //table details for(var thisRow in c.data.documentation[thisType].metaData.records){ body+= '' var values = {}; //objects are notorious for not being sortable by property so we'll use the array to control how they are applied and ensure they match the column headers for(var thisCell in c.data.documentation[thisType].metaData.records[thisRow]){ if(thisCell != '$$hashKey') values[thisCell] = c.data.documentation[thisType].metaData.records[thisRow][thisCell] || ' '; } colOrder.forEach(function(column){ body+= ''; }); body+= '' } body+= '
'+ c.data.documentation[thisType].metaData.columnHeader[thisDetail] +'
'+values[column]+'

' } if(c.data.excludedSummary.length!=0){ //Also, list any updates that have been excluded (in summary form) body+= '

Miscellaneous updates

' body+= '

Note: the following additional minor updates are also included and have been summarised below

' body+= '' body+= '' ////////////////////// //table details for(var thisExclusion in c.data.excludedSummary){ body+= '' body+= '' body+= '' body+= '' body+= '' } body+= '
NameTableNumber of Updates
'+c.data.excludedSummary[thisExclusion].name+''+c.data.excludedSummary[thisExclusion].table+''+c.data.excludedSummary[thisExclusion].count+'

' } var sourceHTML = header + body + ""; var source = 'data:application/vnd.ms-word;charset=utf-8,' + encodeURIComponent(sourceHTML); var fileDownload = document.createElement("a"); document.body.appendChild(fileDownload); fileDownload.href = source; fileDownload.download = 'Update Set Documentation.doc'; fileDownload.click(); document.body.removeChild(fileDownload); } c.deleteItem = function (index) { if(c.data.whichSets.length!=0){ c.data.whichSets.splice(index, 1); } if(c.data.whichSets.length==0){ c.data.activity='instructions'; } } // ////////////////////////////////////////////////// }]]>c.question { text-align: center; margin-top: 1em; } .spacer { display:inline-block; width:5%; } .btn-question { width: 45%; } /* Tables ================================== */ .Rtable { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; margin: 0 0 0 0; padding: 0; color:#717171; } .Rtable-cell { box-sizing: border-box; flex-grow: 1; width: 100%; // Default to full width padding: 0.3em 0.8em; overflow: hidden; // Or flex might break list-style: none; border: 1px solid silver; background: fade(slategrey,20%); font-size:14px; > h1, > h2, > h3, > h4, > h5, > h6 { margin: 0; } } .tableCell { /*width:100px;*/ border: 1px solid silver; padding:5px; font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 10px; } .tableHeader { /*width:100px;*/ border: 1px solid silver; padding:5px; background-color:aliceblue; font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 10px; } .tableHeader:first-child { width: 200px; } .Rtable-cell-detail { font-weight:bold; } .unread{ background-color:#006600; color:white; } .rowSelected{ background-color:#002966; color:white; } /* Table column sizing ================================== */ .Rtable--2cols > .Rtable-cell { width: 50%; } .Rtable--3cols > .Rtable-cell { width: 33.33%; } .Rtable--4cols > .Rtable-cell { width: 25%; } .Rtable--5cols > .Rtable-cell { width: 20%; } .Rtable--6cols > .Rtable-cell { width: 16.6%; } .loader { border: 12px solid #f3f3f3; border-radius: 50%; border-top: 16px solid #3498db; width: 75px; height: 75px; -webkit-animation: spin 1s linear infinite; /* Safari */ animation: spin 1s linear infinite; } /* Safari */ @-webkit-keyframes spin { 0% { -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg); } 100% { -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg); } } @keyframes spin { 0% { transform: rotate(0deg); } 100% { transform: rotate(360deg); } } .center { margin: auto; width: 20%; padding: 10px; } sp_instancefalseupdate_set_documentationfalse+update set documentationfalsefalsesp_widgetadmin2019-03-21 04:02:416aa227314f10330070cf4a10a310c790158+update set documentationglobalglobalsp_widget_6aa227314f10330070cf4a10a310c790admin2019-04-10 22:49:04

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_ac33eb754f10330070cf4a10a310c713
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Provides a JSON object containing the definitions of update set tables and fields</description><global>false</global><name>definitions.js</name><script><![CDATA[//You can edit this text file to add defintions or to exclude repetitive low-value items from your update set documentation, seeing them only in summary

var exclusions = ['Column','Container','Row','Indexes', 'UI Action Role', 'Data Policy Rule', 'Dictionary Entry Override', 'System Property Category', 'Supports Service Portal search functionality', 'Table Subscription Configuration', 'Installation Exit', 'Contained Role', 'Variables', 'Form Sections', 'Access Roles', 'System Property Category', 'Embedded List Control','Field Label','Test Step', 'Test Suite Test','Instance of Simple List'];

var definitions = [
   {
      "name": "Access Control",
      "table": "sys_security_acl",
      "fields": "name,description,operation,type",
      "description": "Access Controls are security rules which define access/restriction on tables and records. Normally these are managed by roles, but they can exploit any particular aspect of a user's profile, such as their location or their department."
   },
   {
      "name": "Access Roles",
      "table": "sys_security_acl_role",
      "fields": "sys_security_acl,sys_user_role",
      "description": "Defines the roles applicable to ACL security"
   },
   {
      "name": "Angular Providers",
      "table": "m2m_sp_ng_pro_sp_widget",
      "fields": "sys_name,widget",
      "description": "Angular components that can be reused in multiple portal widgets"
   },
   {
      "name": "Angular ng-template",
      "table": "sp_ng_template",
      "fields": "sys_name,sp_widget,sys_update_name,package",
      "description": "Angular templates are used to customise behaviour of the service portal"
   },
   {
      "name": "Application Menu",
      "table": "sys_app_application",
      "fields": "sys_name,description,roles,order",
      "description": "Menus created or modified to improve navigation of ServiceNow"
   },
   {
      "name": "Assessment Metric",
      "table": "asmt_metric",
      "fields": "name,description,metric_type,template,reference_table",
      "description": "Metrics defined and used to evaluate assessable records"
   },
   {
      "name": "Assessment Metric Type",
      "table": "asmt_metric_type",
      "fields": "name,description,table,job,roles",
      "description": "Metric types used in assessments"
   },
   {
      "name": "Assessment Question Choice",
      "table": "",
      "fields": "question,value",
      "description": "Provides a list of questions for assessments"
   },
   {
      "name": "Assignment Rule",
      "table": "sysrule_assignment",
      "fields": "category,subcategory,assignment_group,assigned_to",
      "description": "Assignment rules govern how tasks are distributed to resolver groups"
   },
   {
      "name": "Branch",
      "table": "",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "List of branches imported in the system"
   },
   {
      "name": "Business Rule",
      "table": "sys_script",
      "fields": "name,description,when,condition",
      "description": "Business rules ensure business logic can be enforced when records are viewed, created, updated or deleted"
   },
   {
      "name": "Business Section",
      "table": "",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "List of imported business sections"
   },
   {
      "name": "CSS Include",
      "table": "sp_css_include",
      "fields": "name,sp_css,source,url",
      "description": "CSS included to customise service portal look and feel"
   },
   {
      "name": "Carousel Slide",
      "table": "sp_carousel_slide",
      "fields": "name,description,carousel,background",
      "description": "Service portal carousel slides"
   },
   {
      "name": "Cart Layout",
      "table": "sc_layout",
      "fields": "sys_name,title,short_description",
      "description": "Definition of layout and functionality of the service catalogue cart"
   },
   {
      "name": "Catalog",
      "table": "sc_catalog",
      "fields": "sys_name,description,manager,editors",
      "description": "Catalogues provide users the ability to request catalogue items such as service and product offerings"
   },
   {
      "name": "Catalog Client Scripts",
      "table": "catalog_script_client",
      "fields": "sys_name,description,cat_item,type,variable_set,field",
      "description": "Client scripts change the way a form behaves in response to user input"
   },
   {
      "name": "Catalog Item",
      "table": "sc_cat_item",
      "fields": "sys_name,description,sc_catalogs,category,workflow",
      "description": "Items and services that can be requested through the service catalogue. The availability of these items is determined by user criteria."
   },
   {
      "name": "Catalog UI Policy",
      "table": "catalog_ui_policy",
      "fields": "variable_set,table,short_description,catalog_item,conditions,catalog_conditions",
      "description": "Catalog UI policies define the behaviour of fields in catalog forms. For example, fields may become visible and/or mandatory depending on user inputs in other fields."
   },
   {
      "name": "Catalog UI Policy Action",
      "table": "catalog_ui_policy_action",
      "fields": "ui_policy,variable_set,variable,field,mandatory,disabled,visible",
      "description": "Catalogue UI Policy Actions are client-side logic used by Catalogue UI Policies. They can set field attributes to mandatory, visible, read-only"
   },
   {
      "name": "Category",
      "table": "sc_category",
      "fields": "sys_name,description,sc_catalog",
      "description": "Categories allow service catalogue items to be classified into logical groups"
   },
   {
      "name": "Changes Category",
      "table": "",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Categories for standard change templates"
   },
   {
      "name": "Choice list",
      "table": "",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Choice lists allow users to select a value from a pre-defined set of choices"
   },
   {
      "name": "Client Script",
      "table": "sys_script_client",
      "fields": "name,description,type,field,ui_type",
      "description": "Scripts to customise behaviour of ServiceNow forms"
   },
   {
      "name": "Company",
      "table": "core_company",
      "fields": "name,parent,notes",
      "description": "List of companies and vendors imported in the system"
   },
   {
      "name": "Contract",
      "table": "ast_contract",
      "fields": "name,description,vendor",
      "description": "Contracts imported in the System"
   },
   {
      "name": "Contract Model",
      "table": "cmdb_contract_product_model",
      "fields": "name,description,manufacturer,product_catalog_item,owner",
      "description": "Imported or customised contract models"
   },
   {
      "name": "Dashboard",
      "table": "pa_dashboards",
      "fields": "name,group,groups,owner,sys_overrides",
      "description": "Customised dashboards that provide customer specific reports in a concise format"
   },
   {
      "name": "Dashboard Permissions",
      "table": "pa_dashboards_permissions",
      "fields": "dashboard,group,role,user",
      "description": "Restrict access to dashboards as needed"
   },
   {
      "name": "Data Lookup",
      "table": "",
      "fields": "name,source_table,matcher_table,active",
      "description": "Data Lookup Definitions govern how calculations are performed on various tables"
   },
   {
      "name": "Data Lookup Definitions",
      "table": "dl_definition",
      "fields": "name,source_table,matcher_table,active",
      "description": "Data Lookup Definitions govern how calculations are performed on various tables"
   },
   {
      "name": "Data Policy",
      "table": "sys_data_policy2",
      "fields": "sys_name,description,short_description,model_table,conditions",
      "description": "Data policies are rules that ensure information satisfies specific customer requirements"
   },
   {
      "name": "Data Source",
      "table": "sys_data_source",
      "fields": "name,database_name,connection_url,format,file_retrieval_method,type",
      "description": "A list of custom data sources that allow custom data to be loaded into ServiceNow "
   },
   {
      "name": "Department",
      "table": "cmn_department",
      "fields": "name,description,company,parent",
      "description": "A list of departments imported into the system"
   },
   {
      "name": "Dictionary",
      "table": "",
      "fields": "name,column_label,internal_type,reference",
      "description": "Field dictionaries define details for each table and the definition for every column on each table"
   },
   {
      "name": "Email Client Canned Messages",
      "table": "sys_email_canned_message",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "A type of email template that can be selected from a ServiceNow form when manually sending a client email "
   },
   {
      "name": "Email Script",
      "table": "sys_script_email",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Scripts to dynamically create email body with a common look and feel, consistent with the customer branding."
   },
   {
      "name": "Email Template",
      "table": "sysevent_email_template",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Customised email templates ensure consistency for end-users"
   },
   {
      "name": "Event Registration",
      "table": "sysevent_register",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Registration of events to be used by notifications"
   },
   {
      "name": "Execution Plan",
      "table": "sc_cat_item_delivery_plan",
      "fields": "name,short_description,calendar",
      "description": "Execution plans define how a catalogue item is procured, configured, and installed"
   },
   {
      "name": "Execution Plan Task",
      "table": "sc_cat_item_delivery_task",
      "fields": "name,short_description,delivery_plan",
      "description": "Execution plan tasks are assigned to a fulfillment group and represent the work to be completed as part of the overall request fulfillment process."
   },
   {
      "name": "Field class",
      "table": "sys_glide_object",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Describes the types of field used in service catalogue forms"
   },
   {
      "name": "Form Layout",
      "table": "",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "The layout of the forms can be customised by adding, removing or rearranging fields"
   },
   {
      "name": "Gauge",
      "table": "sys_gauge",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Gauges are added to specific dashboards to visual data in various ways"
   },
   {
      "name": "Group",
      "table": "sys_user_group",
      "fields": "name,manager,email,parent",
      "description": "Defines user groups, which normally contain roles affecting the access of users within ServiceNow"
   },
   {
      "name": "Group Member",
      "table": "sys_user_grmember",
      "fields": "group,user",
      "description": "Contains the membership of each security group"
   },
   {
      "name": "Group Role",
      "table": "sys_group_has_role",
      "fields": "group,role",
      "description": "Contains a list of roles applicable to user groups"
   },
   {
      "name": "Group Type",
      "table": "sys_user_group_type",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Define the resolver group types"
   },
   {
      "name": "Header | Footer",
      "table": "sp_header_footer",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Service portal header and footer customisation used to improve branding and look and feel"
   },
   {
      "name": "Images",
      "table": "db_image",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Images imported in the system to customize the branding and look and feel of the system"
   },
   {
      "name": "Import Export Map",
      "table": "sys_impex_map",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "A transform map used to import or export data"
   },
   {
      "name": "Inbound Email Actions",
      "table": "sysevent_in_email_action",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Inbound email actions define the actions an instance takes when receiving an email, such as creating a new call or an incident"
   },
	 {
      "name": "Input Variables",
      "table": "atf_input_variable",
      "fields": "label,element",
      "description": "Custom variable input fields"
   },
   {
      "name": "Instance",
      "table": "sp_instance",
      "fields": "sp_widget,title,sys_scope,roles",
      "description": "Captures the instances of widgets within the portal"
   },
   {
      "name": "Instance with Link",
      "table": "sp_instance_link",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Entries and boxes to customise the service portal and improve its usability"
   },
   {
      "name": "Instance with Menu",
      "table": "sp_instance_menu",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Menu bars customised to improve look and feel of the service portal, making it consistent with the customer's branding"
   },
   {
      "name": "LDAP OU Definition",
      "table": "ldap_ou_config",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "List of OUs (organisational units) used to filter users and groups being imported from LDAP"
   },
   {
      "name": "LDAP Server",
      "table": "ldap_server_config",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "LDAP server configuration for SSO (single sign on)"
   },
   {
      "name": "LDAP Server URL",
      "table": "ldap_server_url",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "LDAP serves configuration used for Single-Sign-On"
   },
   {
      "name": "List Control",
      "table": "sys_ui_list_control",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Customisations made on the controls available in lists"
   },
   {
      "name": "List Layout",
      "table": "",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Layout of list views to include relevant fields"
   },
   {
      "name": "Location",
      "table": "imp_location",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "A list of locations loaded into ServiceNow"
   },
   {
      "name": "Maintenance Schedule",
      "table": "cmn_schedule_maintenance",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Maintenance schedules are used by change management to determine when changes occur"
   },
   {
      "name": "Menu Item",
      "table": "menu_item",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Items defined for the menus available through the service portal"
   },
   {
      "name": "Metric Category",
      "table": "asmt_metric_category",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Define how survey assessments are categorised"
   },
   {
      "name": "Module",
      "table": "sys_app_module",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Modules (menu entries) created or modified to improve navigation of ServiceNow"
   },
   {
      "name": "Notification",
      "table": "sysevent_email_action",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Email notifications are used to inform end users and resolver groups about relevant events"
   },
   {
      "name": "Order guide",
      "table": "sc_cat_item_guide",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Order guides are a special type of catalogue entry that allows a number of catalogue items to be grouped together into a single form. Once approved, the various items within the order guide may follow different workflows"
   },
   {
      "name": "Page",
      "table": "content_page",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Pages in the service portal customised to provide customer's specific functionalities"
   },
   {
      "name": "Record Producer",
      "table": "sc_cat_item_producer",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Record producers are a particular type of catalogue items that allows users to create a record, such as an incident."
   },
   {
      "name": "Relationship",
      "table": "sys_relationship",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Advanced relationships between tables to create customer specific related lists"
   },
   {
      "name": "Report",
      "table": "sys_report",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Reports allow data to be represented in a variety of ways visually to make patterns easier to understand"
   },
   {
      "name": "Resource Configuration",
      "table": "cxs_res_context_config",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Supports Service Portal search functionality."
   },
   {
      "name": "Risk Conditions",
      "table": "risk_conditions",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Rules that define risk and impact conditions for change records"
   },
   {
      "name": "Role",
      "table": "sys_user_role",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Roles are used to define which user can access specific forms and tables, and what functionality is available to them"
   },
   {
      "name": "SLA Definition",
      "table": "contract_sla",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Service Level Agreements can be created on any table based on the task table, such as incidents, requests and changes"
   },
   {
      "name": "Scheduled Data Import",
      "table": "scheduled_data_import",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Scheduled process to import and synch data from LDAP"
   },
   {
      "name": "Script Include",
      "table": "sys_script_include",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Server-side Javascript code that can be reusable by multiple system components (business rules, workflows, etc)"
   },
   {
      "name": "Search Context",
      "table": "cxs_context_config",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Contextual search definitions"
   },
   {
      "name": "Search Resource Context Property",
      "table": "cxs_res_context_config_prop",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Configures the search functionality within the service portal"
   },
   {
      "name": "Search Source",
      "table": "m2m_sp_portal_search_source",
      "fields": "name,id,page,sys_scope,roles",
      "description": "Extends the ability of the service portal to search other data sources, whether that's knowledge, catalogue items, or any other type of information. "
   },
   {
      "name": "Service Portal",
      "table": "sp_portal",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Base configuration of the service portal. Customers may have more than one portal serving different purposes."
   },
   {
      "name": "Style Sheet",
      "table": "content_css",
      "fields": "name,sys_scope",
      "description": "Stylesheet defined for the service portal to allow UI customization for requestors."
   },
   {
      "name": "Stylesheets",
      "table": "m2m_sp_theme_css_include",
      "fields": "name,short_description",
      "description": "Stylesheets define the way ServiceNow appears to fulfillment users."
   },
   {
      "name": "System Property",
      "table": "sys_properties",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Base System configurations customised. These may differ between production and development environments"
   },
   {
      "name": "Tab",
      "table": "pa_tabs",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Dashboard tabs created in ServiceNow"
   },
   {
      "name": "Table",
      "table": "sys_db_object",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Tables are added or customised to support customer specific functionalities"
   },
   {
      "name": "Table Transform Map",
      "table": "sys_transform_map",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Transformation maps are used to import data in the system from an external data source"
   },
   {
      "name": "Theme",
      "table": "sp_theme",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Service portal themes customise the branding and overall look and feel"
   },
   {
      "name": "Trigger Condition",
      "table": "asmt_condition",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Conditions that trigger the generation of a customer survey"
   },
   {
      "name": "UI Action",
      "table": "sys_ui_action",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Buttons and links added to ServiceNow forms to allow users to undertake specific actions"
   },
   {
      "name": "UI Page",
      "table": "sys_ui_page",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Custom pages/popups to customize behaviour and add functionalities of ServiceNow"
   },
   {
      "name": "UI Policy",
      "table": "sys_ui_policy",
      "fields": "name,table,short_description,conditions",
      "description": "UI policies dynamically change information on a form given a specific condition. The changes are performed using either UI Policy Actions or scripts."
   },
   {
      "name": "UI Policy Action",
      "table": "sys_ui_policy_action",
      "fields": "ui_policy,field,mandatory,visible,disabled",
      "description": "UI Policy Actions are client-side logic used by UI Policies. They can set field attributes to mandatory, visible, read-only"
   },
   {
      "name": "UI Script",
      "table": "sys_ui_script",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Allows forms to dynamically change in response to user input "
   },
   {
      "name": "UI View",
      "table": "sys_ui_view",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Customised form views that include specific fields for a particular purpose"
   },
   {
      "name": "User Criteria",
      "table": "user_criteria",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Configurations to restrict access to records in Service Catalogue and Knowledge Base, as defined by the customer"
   },
   {
      "name": "User Role",
      "table": "sys_user_has_role",
      "fields": "user,role",
      "description": "A comprehensive list of all the roles a user has inherited by being part of a group"
   },
   {
      "name": "Variable",
      "table": "item_option_new",
      "fields": "cat_item,record_producer_table,variable_set,question_text,name",
      "description": "Variables defined in catalog items and record producers"
   },{
      "name": "Vendor Contact",
      "table": "",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Vendor contacts imported in the system"
   },
   {
      "name": "View Rule",
      "table": "sysrule_view",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Rules used to enforce a specific form or list view for a table"
   },
   {
      "name": "Welcome Page Section",
      "table": "sys_home",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Defines how the welcome page appears when logging on"
   },
   {
      "name": "Widget",
      "table": "sys_widgets",
      "fields": "name,id,description",
      "description": "Widgets are components within the service portal and add functionality that improves the user experience."
   },
   {
      "name": "Workflow",
      "table": "wf_workflow",
      "fields": "name,description",
      "description": "Workflows created or customised (for changes, requests, SLAs, contracts) to fit a customer's business processes."
   }
];
